/Users/michaeltouboul/ms-backend-2/apps/.serviceRawFile:
service: sls-template

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: eu-west-1
  stage: dev
  timeout: 29

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

functions:
  api:
    handler: src/lambda.handler
    events:
      - httpApi: '*'

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 4001

build:
  esbuild:
    bundle: true
    minify: false
    sourcemap: true
    platform: node
    target: node20
    external:
      - aws-sdk
      - '@nestjs/microservices'
      - '@nestjs/microservices/microservices-module'
      - '@nestjs/websockets'
      - '@nestjs/websockets/socket-module'
